name: Jungle Birds Shooter Pro: Hunt
description:
Let's go for hunting in safari jungle with the modern sniper gun to shoot the flying birds. Have you ever done wings shooting in the jungle? Let's start! Grab your Sniper and Shoot the flying bird. Jungle Birds Shooter Pro: Hunt is just for you to hunt the flying birds. Game is the best bird target experience hunts with a 3D Sniper Gun on Apps Store.

Enjoy real shooting experience as a HUNTER. Play the hunting game of 2018 in the safari jungle, which is full of crow, duck, eagles, sparrow, pigeon, seagul, an owl. Huntsman! You have to hunt them with best huntings skills, be a Hero of Wings Shooter (Hunter) Game. Show your Sniper Huntsman Shooting skills & tactics in front of tricky and crazy birds. Your target is to alive as well as shoot them within the given period of time. You are a frontline jungle hunter, just show your professional shooting skills & tactics to survive. You have to complete different challenging levels so shoot an duck, crow, eagle, sparrow, owl, crow.

It's really best hunting game quest to hunt in a real environment, you have to aim your bird target with sharp eye so that makes you a skilled wings wild hunter. Jungle Birds Shooter Pro: Hunt is all about fun, trill and adventure. Birds are very sharp & smart so to be a Real Wings Hunter you must have good aiming tactics & skills while holding your breath. You have to do elite army action for wing hunting with the eagle eye. Some are fast and quick to get away from your vision so, you have to take extra care while you are shooting them within the given time to unlock next level.

Hunt Flying Birds sharply to unlock next level of the game. Your victory will also let you unlock new Bird for hunting. Enjoy the real adventure with animals like birds. You have to alive by shooting most dangerous birds. You have modern weapons to perform in a army sniper target hunting. Flying wings and birds hunting gives you a chance to be a modern wingshooting shooter. Never give up at any stage as every stage with full of adventure also a little bit hard from the first stage. Every Level is full of real action, adventure and shoots fun for winghunting Lovers.

FEATURES
- HD Clear Graphics
- Multiple Challenging Levels to become a Real Sniper Hunter
- Friendly Smooth Game Play and Graphical User Interface
- Jungle Birds Hunting is FPS (First Person Shooter) Game
- Best Birds with Real Animations
- Best Accuracy & smooth controls of Sniper Gun
- Full of Action and Thrill in GamePlay
- Easy to Find Bird with the Help of Map.


HOW TO PLAY
- Bird Aiming - Press on Aim/Zoom Button and Swipe for Bird Target
- Firing - Tap Fire Button when the bird is the exact center position of your aim.

Download Jungle Birds Shooter Pro: Hunt and Play Now.
